conversion_verification.notes: Successful 3D axonometric projection with clear wall thickness and floor depth.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D transformation. Perfect wall geometry, clear floor planes, and standard isometric-style viewing angle.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Layout fidelity is high. Room configurations and wall placements match the 2D plan precisely. Staircase geometry and entrance stairs are correctly interpreted.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement is highly accurate. Dining set, kitchen cabinetry, sofa arrangement, and bed orientation follow the floor plan layout exactly.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean rendering. High structural clarity with effective use of materials to distinguish elements. Minor shadow artifact in the stairwell.

detected_errors.description: The 3D render adds a small unnecessary partition wall near the entrance/stairwell not present in the original line work.

summary: Outstanding 3D conversion that maintains near-perfect geometric fidelity and architectural intent from the 2D source.
